entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 6:35AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Snowy End Of The Week Over The Eastern Interior... Expect snow to develop over the Interior Southeast of Fairbanks on Thursday. The snow will then spread northwest to about Ft Yukon and Tanana by Thursday night, and then persist into Friday and likely continue into Saturday. Fairbanks is expected to see a chance of snow Thursday afternoon,
entry.cap:areaDesc: Central Interior; Deltana and Tanana Flats; Denali; Eastern Alaska Range; Middle Tanana Valley; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country; Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands
